'''Water and Justice''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Story==
{{Description|"'Existence' was [[Egeria]]'s justice... and to me, justice is the 'continuation' of that existence."|title=Dance of Justice}}

==Trivia==
*Unlike the other Event Cards that feature an [[Archon]] and require two characters from their respective region, this card does not quote an [[:Category:Ascension Gems|Ascension Gem]], but instead quotes a line from [[Focalors]] in the {{Quest|The Opera of Noirceur and Blancheur}}.
